name: Folktales
description:
Become immersed in the story using the latest technologies. This game will transform your understanding of the world.

Tales currently available:

The Two Hunchbacks

Coming soon:

Crystal Rooster

Controls:

Click or Tap to go to advance story.

I made this game using Typescript and the Three.js game engine. I also used my game framework extension Factorygame-ts and wrote several visual novel and adventure game modules to enhance the folktale genre with many interactive styles. I hope you enjoy the experience!

Source code: https://github.com/herobank110/web-folktales
